1.title: Pilot
1.plot: Casper decides to get back in to guarding and up and coming singer Janet.

imdb.plot outline: After putting behind his life as a soap star bodyguard. Casper moves home to be with his family and friends. Unsure of where his future lies. a record label convinces him to join their company. Janet is an up and coming singer guided by her manager Logan who is also her boyfriend and does not like Casper at all. Can Casper handle the small town life, traveling with someone he might be in love with, and the consistent interference of Janet's manager Logan? Will Casper get the answer to his question. The answer that can only come from Janet. Is there love after Drew and can it be with Janet?
imdb.title: Lost in Love
plot: Casper is a Bodyguard to the top soap stars on daytime TV, but can he find love and keep his friendship all in tack.::Norman F. May

After putting behind his life as a soap star bodyguard. Casper moves home to be with his family and friends. Unsure of where his future lies. a record label convinces him to join their company. Janet is an up and coming singer guided by her manager Logan who is also her boyfriend and does not like Casper at all. Can Casper handle the small town life, traveling with someone he might be in love with, and the consistent interference of Janet's manager Logan? Will Casper get the answer to his question. The answer that can only come from Janet. Is there love after Drew and can it be with Janet?::Norman F. May
